phrases.original: Any member of the International Christian Churches (ICC) may use this app, but must be properly authorized first. Those who have a usd21.org e-mail address are automatically authorized, and can also authorize others.
phrases.translated: Any member of the International Christian Churches (ICC) may use this app, but must be properly authorized first. Those who have a usd21.org e-mail address are automatically authorized, and can also authorize others.

phrases.original: To authorize a new user, please first verify that they are a member of the church in good standing. Then complete the form below. Doing this will cause a special link to be sent to the new user, granting them full access.
